name: Campfyr
description:
You find yourself stuck in a time loop!

Every time you log out of the chat room Campfyr, you find yourself waking up again on the same morning... as if nothing had ever happened!

Navigate your way through the same conversations over and over to try and piece together the bits of information you need to solve the time loop and free the world from this endless day.

Programming and Design:
Graham Downey
Carson Dickinson
Owen Burland

SFX Design:
Shradha Ganesh
